item.title: Assignment 2
item.description: In this assignment, I will solve 3 problems from the Euler Project using Python. You can access the source code here: https://github.com/zhhmyz/BIOS-823 Problem 13: Large Sum Work out the first ten digits of the sum of the following one-hundread 50-digit numbers. Solved by 225065 Link: https://projecteuler.net/problem=13 nums = """ one-hundred 50-digit numbers """" def large_sum(a): """Sum 50-digit numbers and return the first ten digits Parameters ---------- a : string A one-hundred numbers string that is separated by '\n' Returns ------- int First ten digits of the calculation """ a = a.

item.title: How I Made this Hugo Site
item.description: Bascially, I follow the tutorial of Hugo (Quick Start) to set up this website. The website of tutoials I read are https://gohugo.io/hosting-and-deployment/hosting-on-github/ , https://gohugo.io/getting-started/quick-start/ Step 1: Install the Hugo. brew install hugo Step 2: Create a new hugo site. hugo new site hugo Step 3: Download and install a theme from Github or the official website of Hugo. I chose the theme “ananke” Step 4: You can start the Hugo server, and add your contents in the file of the /content/posts.
